thread.title: Design Your Perfect Bra And We'll Tell You A Secret Desire Of Yours

author: Gena-mour Barrett
title: Design Your Perfect Bra And We'll Tell You A Secret Desire Of Yours

organizations.name: balcony getty images / buzzfeed black white beige blue red floral getty images

text:
View this image › 
Getty Images / BuzzFeed ID: 10561904 Getty Images / BuzzFeed Via victoriassecret.com Full cup Via marksandspencer.com Plunge Via marksandspencer.com T-Shirt Via marksandspencer.com Crop top Via victoriassecret.com Bralette Via marksandspencer.com Balcony Getty Images / BuzzFeed Black White Beige Blue Red Floral Getty Images / BuzzFeed Extra-thin straps Double straps Via Getty Images Regular straps Via marksandspencer.com Thick straps Via Getty Images Strapless Via victoriassecret.com Convertible straps Getty Images / BuzzFeed Lace Satin mix Silk mix Cotton Nylon Via marksandspencer.com Polyester mix Getty Images / BuzzFeed Basic underwire bra Firm underwire bra Basic padded underwire No underwire, no padding Push-up padded bra Maximum support bra Design Your Perfect Bra And We’ll Tell You A Secret Desire Of Yours You got: To be rich Or at least very, very wealthy. It’s not that you’re materialistic, it’s just that money comes very high at the top of your “worry list”, and you often find yourself daydreaming about a future of wealth and fortune.
Getty Images You got: To be famous You’d probably never admit it out loud, but you’ve always been intrigued by the idea of fame. Even though you know it wouldn’t be easy, the thought of going to all the best events and chilling with celebrities has always seemed appealing. And you’re sure you’d use your fame for good anyway.
Getty Images You got: To fall in love You’re a die-hard romantic who’s in love with love. Even when you’re not in a relationship, you’re a sucker for a cute couple or a rom-com movie that pulls at the heart strings. You have a lot of love to give, and you’re always looking to share it.
Getty Images You got: To travel You’re an explorer and believe that life’s too short to stay in the same place. There’s nothing that excites you more than seeing the world, and you’re always looking for the next big adventure.
Getty Images You got: To stay young Even though you know that ageing is a natural part of life, the idea of getting old scares you. You often feel like you’re wasting your life away if you’re not doing something at every moment, and have a tendency to compare your own achievements with the achievements of your agemates.
Getty Images You got: To be stress-free Your main priority is to live a relaxed, stress-free life, where everything is happy and chill. For this reason you absolutely hate confrontation (you rarely have arguments with your friends), and largely like to go with the flow rather than plan things.
Getty Images   10561080   
Gena-mour Barrett
